room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80's" by Spymaker Escape Rooms in Flint
review: We had such a blast spending Valentines Day as a family here! We did the 80's room and loved all the clues and throwbacks, and the staff was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80's" by Spymaker Escape Rooms in Flint
review: My family and I tried our hand at Escape the 80's for my birthday party. The puzzles were challenging with only a little 80's knowledge required. We did not escape the 80's within the allotted time but we all had a great experience.The owners whom we met afterwords have a great passion for what they do. I would definitely do another escape room.
